column5: Private queen bedroom available in southwest Austin, close to downtown and shopping. Quiet residential neighborhood with easy access to expressway. 1 cat on the property but is not allowed access to the guest room. Weightlifting platform on the property perfect for traveling CrossFitters, powerlifters, weightlifters, etc. We do use the space for lifting/coaching in a noisy capacity from 5:30-8:30 most week nights, but try to keep the noise to a minimum after 9pm.
column8: Private Room, cat & weightlifting platform in home
